name: Primeinstitute.co.uk
overview:
Prime Institute of Technology programmes are intended to meet the demands of industry for exceptionally capable, multi-skilled and talented ‘elite’ graduates.

The curriculum offers students broad-based academic and practical experience that will enable students to understand and apply current theories in technology, management and e-commerce as well as acquire the knowledge to specialise in a chosen field. Our Collaborative Partners include the well-established UK and Cyprus Universities, the University of Wales, the University of East London, and Cyprus International University.

Our Technology programmes are intended to meet the demands of industry for exceptionally capable, multi-skilled and talented ‘elite’ graduates.
